name: Rockabilly
description:
I have made this game for a week during my Masters where we had to let our creativity go and show a piece of ourselves. As I am a big fan of the 50s (60s in Hungary) and its music, fashion scene, I have decided to create a game that brings a date night in those times alive.

Disclaimer: I don't own every artwork and music in the game, I'm solely responsible for the design.
